row.name: PROD.INCLUDE.X.TBS.INFOSOURCE.SET_DATAMINE_COORDINATOR_AS_HOST
row.description: Sets the job's host as the DatamineCoordinatorServer

row.process:
! ((ENVPROPS: UC4_ENV_ID=UC4.0100.PROD UC4_MAJOR_APP=TBS Created=2019-06-01 09:01:02 CDT ! Make sure to include INCLUDE.X.TBS.INFOSOURCE.DATAMINE_CLOUD_AWS_SETTINGS before this :PUT_ATT HOST = &EMR_COORDINATOR_HOST# :PUT_ATT LOGIN = &DABR# :PRINT "Running on host: &EMR_COORDINATOR_HOST#"
! ))
